products.title: Voile FR Sandshell Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Sandshell Cream Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Voile FR fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades.  
 Durable and stylish, this translucent cream roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile roller blind is made by our expert team in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service!

products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Oyster Cream Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Oyster Cream Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Lace White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate Lace White
products.productdescription: The Palate Lace White is one of the whitest fabrics in our blackout roller blind range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a Blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Slices Citrus Burst Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The soft shades of pastel yellow and grey on this blind make for a perfect colour palette in which to base the rest of your rooms decor from. The softer shades will give you greater scope and range of colours to pair with this blind, giving you a warm
products.productdescription: The soft shades of pastel yellow and grey on this blind make for a perfect colour palette in which to base the rest of your rooms decor from. The softer shades will give you greater scope and range of colours to pair with this blind, giving you a warm and inviting decor to come home to. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Burst Royal Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Just like a nice business suit, this blind loves to work hard and party harder. Moderate and refined, the deep Royal Blue is a statement of professionalism and style that works perfectly in a range of colour schemes, from neutral tones like beiges and
products.productdescription: Just like a nice business suit, this blind loves to work hard and party harder. Moderate and refined, the deep Royal Blue is a statement of professionalism and style that works perfectly in a range of colour schemes, from neutral tones like beiges and browns, to a more blue oriented palette in which this blind will act as the foil. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind. A wipe clean, dim out fabric perfect for any room in the house. Available in over 60 colours and patterns.
products.productdescription: Off-white is one of those colour categories that we will always endorse as a choice for your blind, as it brings an elements of modest sophistication to almost any colour palette. Lacking the yellows of other more beige tones, it is much more suited to softening a primary colour but likewise is not out of place in a room filled with an earthier beat. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Screenview Black/Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Screenview Black/Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Screenview roller blinds, are a set of flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics, made from a Pvc/Polyester fabric which are perfect for temperature control in offices and hot rooms. 
  
This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful UV rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These Magic Screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in. Perfect for maintaining privacy if you live near a busy road/ street or have have a room that is over-looked by other properties. 
  
At Swift Direct Blinds, with over 50 years’ experience, we take quality seriously.  Our bespoke roller blinds are crafted by our team of experts, and not only comes with customer-first service and industry-leading quick delivery times, but also comes with a FREE five year guarantee!  This means our customers can be sure that our products are made to last. 
  
Still not sure?  Why not indulge in our FREE sampling service, posted via 1st class post, or call our friendly customer services team for any queries or questions.

products.productdescription: The icy blue colour of the Robin N Frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Speciality Morning Flight
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.metadescription: Amor Ironmonger Roller Blind. 100% Blackout fabric, 100% made to measure and 100% bespoke to you. Available in hundreds of styles and patterns
products.productdescription: The soft grey colour of the Amor Ironmonger is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and dark greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a blackout material so will stop all of the light from passing through the material, making these ideal for bedrooms.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Disney Princess Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Disney Princess Roller Blind
products.productdescription: Liven up your childs bedroom with one of our Disney roller blinds, 100% blackout to help ensure a great nights sleep, and in a range of clasic prints that'll help make bedtime something to look forward to! As standard all of our blinds are child safe coming with a clear clip to hold the chain taught and agaisnt the wall so there are no free-hanging cords. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms where you need darkness to help give your child the best night sleep possible.

products.title: Clear Transparent PVC COVID-19 Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Discover our plastic clear roller blind here. Please let us know if you have any questions and we will be more than happy to help you further.
products.productdescription: This product is designed to protect both your customers and employees from the potential spread of COVID-19. This Fire Retardent PVC transparent roller blind is perfect for use to segregate staff in retail environments, without losing light or visibility of your workplace. These blinds have been used above counter tops, between factory workers and too between retail workers (such as Hairdressers and Nail Parlours). These see through roller blinds are essential in the above environments to protect the spread of aerosols from coughing, sneezing and day-to-day movements. We have designed this product so that the blinds can be installed directly onto any solid surface and also all suspended ceilings too! Hence they are perfect for office blocks too - they require a specific bracket which are available to purchase to fix onto the back bar of the roller blind which too ensures the weight of the product can be equally distributed along any fixing surface. We supply the blind on a rigid aluminium back bar and specify guide wires as standard; so that if there were any potential for the blind to swing around when in operation, the optional side guide wires enable the blind to run on two very discreet cables either side of the blind which effectively puts the blind under tension and prevents any potential hazards, for example in a hairdressers where outside doors are opening. The blind is operated by a 1000mm Chrome Metal Chain. Motorisation is possible for this blind type on an integrated battery or hardwired solution. Transparent PVC resin film with a low thermal conductivity, UV resistance tested for 1000 hours of sun exposure with high flexibility. Produced according to the European product regulations concerning dangerous chemical substances as Regulation 1907/2006 named REACH. The transparent PVC can simply be washed with soap and water to keep it clear from germs, and clean to see through! **For orders over 100 units, we can offer a chargeable nationwide fitting service installed within 5-7 working days - please contact Customer Services should you have this type of enquiry and we will be happy to help** Please do let us know if you have any specific questions about this transparent clear plastic roller blind and we will be more than happy to help you further.
